title: Is a New Ice Age Coming? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/16/18
itunes:title: Is a New Ice Age Coming? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/16/18
description:
George Noory and weather researcher Robert Felix discuss his theory that the Earth is not going to be threatened by global warming, but instead by a new ice age and extreme cold.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
